title: Cannabis Industry Is Truly An Emerging Market With Noa Kahner
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Noa Kahner is founder of Kahner Global, which produces investment conferences, including The Cannabis Private Investment Summit Series. Noa joins Rena Sherbill to discuss institutional investors in the cannabis space and the evolution of the industry. They also cover why investing in cannabis is different than any other industry and the importance of thinking strategically. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
